Definition.WordDefinition: LECTURER, n. One with his hand in your pocket, his tongue in your ear and his faith in your patience.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lecturer \Lec"tur*er\ (-[~e]r), n. One who lectures; an assistant preacher. [1913 Webster]
lecturer n 1: a public lecturer at certain universities [syn: {lector}, {reader}] 2: someone who lectures professionally
